dt: {bc}adapted or altered to have or conform to typically {a_link|American} characteristics {bc}American in quality or character

dt.t: As the flock became more educated and more {wi}Americanized{/wi}, they wanted to be seen as real Americans.

shortdef: adapted or altered to have or conform to typically American characteristics : American in quality or character

dt: {bc}to cause to acquire or conform to {a_link|American} characteristics
{bc}to bring (something, such as an area) under the political, cultural, or commercial influence of the U.S.
{bc}to acquire or conform to American traits

shortdef: to cause to acquire or conform to American characteristics
